name: Open House
location: Harmony Hub, 321 Bridge Street, Ottawa, ON
description: Come explore everything Harmony Hub has to offer! Meet our team, take a tour of our facilities, and learn more about our programs and services.

name: Book Club
location: Harmony Hub, 321 Bridge Street, Ottawa, ON
description: Join us for an engaging discussion of Matt Haig's The Midnight Library, our book of the month. All are welcome!

name: Yoga Class
location: Harmony Hub, 321 Bridge Street, Ottawa, ON
description: Relax and recharge with a gentle yoga class conducted by our qualified instructor. Please bring your own mat and water bottle.
